Package testing

Class Fitnesstesting

java.lang.Object
testing.Fitnesstesting
public class Fitnesstesting
extends java.lang.Object
A Class that would measure a person's BMI depending on his Age, especially for Kids.
Author:
Dosado, Michael Vincent C.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int age  
    double bmi  
    double height  
    static Fitnesstesting person  
    java.lang.String personName  
    char sex  
    double weight  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Fitnesstesting()
    Constructor Method for the Fitness Program

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void bmi_Result_kids​(int age, double bmi)
    This Method is to determine the BMI result for kids using a switch case that changes the output behaviour of the program.
    void bmi_Results_adults​(double bmi)
    Method
    void check_Age​(int age)
    Method to check the age of the person that will change the program's Behavior by changing the criteria that will determine the appropriate BMI result for the person's Age, especially for Kids below Age 20, thus following the "Template Method" Behavior Design Pattern
    void exit()
    Method that closes the Program in the Command Terminal / Prompt
    double get_BMI()
    Method containing the BMI Formula by getting the person's Weight and Height through User Input that will pass its value to the this.bmi variable to be used when determining the result of the BMI
    static Fitnesstesting getInstance()
    Accessor Method to make sure it has only 1 Instance as per the "Singleton" Design Pattern
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    Main Method of the Program which creates the Instance/Object of the Fitness Class and starts the Constructor that initializes the needed info and runs the methods to measure that person's BMI thus Following the "Facade" Structural Design Pattern
    int set_Age()
    Method that sets the age of the Person that will determine the behaviour of the program
    java.lang.String set_Name()
    Method that sets the Name of the Person
    char set_Sex()
    Sets the "Sex" of the Person to be examined

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • getInstance

      public static Fitnesstesting getInstance()
      Accessor Method to make sure it has only 1 Instance as per the "Singleton" Design Pattern
      Returns:
      person

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main Method of the Program which creates the Instance/Object of the Fitness Class and starts the Constructor that initializes the needed info and runs the methods to measure that person's BMI thus Following the "Facade" Structural Design Pattern
      Parameters:
      String - [] args

    • set_Sex

      public char set_Sex()
      Sets the "Sex" of the Person to be examined
      Parameters:
      User_input - Male or Female
      Returns:
      sex

    • check_Age

      public void check_Age​(int age)
      Method to check the age of the person that will change the program's Behavior by changing the criteria that will determine the appropriate BMI result for the person's Age, especially for Kids below Age 20, thus following the "Template Method" Behavior Design Pattern
      Parameters:
      age - this.age

    • bmi_Result_kids

      public void bmi_Result_kids​(int age, double bmi)
      This Method is to determine the BMI result for kids using a switch case that changes the output behaviour of the program.
      Parameters:
      age - this.age
      bmi - this.bmi

    • bmi_Results_adults

      public void bmi_Results_adults​(double bmi)
      Method
      Parameters:
      bmi - BMI value from the this.bmi variable

    • set_Age

      public int set_Age()
      Method that sets the age of the Person that will determine the behaviour of the program
      Returns:
      age returns the value of age to the this.age variable

    • set_Name

      public java.lang.String set_Name()
      Method that sets the Name of the Person
      Returns:
      name returns the String name to the this.name variable

    • get_BMI

      public double get_BMI()
      Method containing the BMI Formula by getting the person's Weight and Height through User Input that will pass its value to the this.bmi variable to be used when determining the result of the BMI
      Returns:
      result returns the BMI result

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Method that closes the Program in the Command Terminal / Prompt
